metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3087 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Integer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.289 and 14.x through17.x before 17.0.0.188 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.460 onLinux, Adobe AIR before 17.0.0.172, Adobe AIR SDK before 17.0.0.172, andAdobe AIR SDK & Compiler before 17.0.0.172 allows attackers to executearbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-3087` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.460ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.460ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.460ubuntu0.14.04.1').
